page.title: 08ROCHESTER IN 1985
page.content: My dad owns a restaurant amd my mum works with my dad. Some weekends I help with the washing the dishes and one Sunday l help by clearing up the tables after people have left. Rochester is a place where many tourists come to see the sights. It is a very pretty place and Charles Dickens based some of his stories in Rochester. We have a Dickens festival in Rochester and the High Street is full of stalls with lots of nice things to buy. We all dress up in the restaurant. My mum makes all the dresses that the girls wear and she made the waistcoat for my dad.I don't see my mum and dad much in the Dickens Festival because they are too busy and l have to sleep at my Nan's a lot. After the Dickens Festival everything goes back to normal. By Kate Reader
